title: Crime Alert 06.21.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.21.19
description:
Michigan parents keep five young children locked in room described as a dungeon for years. Convicted rapist, , returns to his wheelchair-bound victim just two days after leaving jail. Pizza delivery man saves two little girls being sexually abused by their father.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
